name: Feywild Gifts

sourceRef.file: docs/sources/phb2024/05-Character Classes (Continued) - Player???s Handbook - Dungeons & Dragons - Sources - D&D Beyond.pdf

entries.gift: Illusory butterflies flutter around you while you take a Short or Long Rest.
Flowers bloom from your hair each dawn.
You faintly smell of cinnamon, lavender, nutmeg, or another comforting herb or spice.
Your shadow dances while no one is looking directly at it.
Horns or antlers sprout from your head.
Your skin and hair change color each dawn.

notes: Roll 1d6 or choose a gift when you gain the Fey Wanderer feature.
